Class CostNode

  • java.lang.Object

    public class CostNode
extends Node

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      (package private) static class  CostNode.Allocator
      The allocator that is in charge of the CostNode type.
      When not specified, the allocator has an initial capacity of 16.
